successes.title: Capture Camera Clip v2 by Peak Design
successes.description: A durable metal clip that lets you carry your camera on any backpack strap, belt or bag. The ultimate tool for all photographers.

Pledges.description: If you simply want to help our cause, or perhaps you want to only order an accessory off the a la carte menu (see FAQ), then choose this reward.
Beginner's Bargain: Get the new Capture Camera Clip. The standard version is made of aluminum and glass-reinforced nylon and comes with the Standard Plate.
Pro's Choice: Get the new CapturePRO Camera Clip. CapturePRO features all-aluminum construction, comes with a PROplate, and can be used as a tripod clamp.
Pro's Choice + GoPro Mount: Get the CapturePRO Camera Clip and the GoPro Mount accessory (shipped separately when ready).
Pro's Choice + PROpad: Get the CapturePRO Camera Clip and the PROpad accessory (shipped separately when ready).
Pro's Choice Bundle: Get the new CapturePRO Camera Clip, along with the PROpad and GoPro Mount accessories (shipped separately when ready).
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Get the Naked Edition of CapturePRO rushed to your doorstep, finished in silver sandblasted aluminum. Shipped as soon as our first articles are ready.

Pro's Choice Bundle (Sleepy Bird): Didn't get one of the first 500 Pro's Choice Bundles? You can still get CapturePRO, the GoPro Mount and PROpad (shipped separately when ready) all in one sweet reward - still less than retail price for all three.
The Whole Shebang: Get CapturePRO, along with the PROpad and GoPro Mount accessories (shipped separately when ready), plus Leash and Cuff camera straps.

EARLY BIRD SUPER SPECIAL: Get the Naked Edition of CapturePRO rushed to your doorstep, and recieve the PROpad and GoPro Mount accessories (shipped separately when ready), plus Leash and Cuff camera straps.
